snippet: Aid groups called the action a token one given the size of the U.S. economy and population, and some Republicans said President Obama was allowing in potential terrorists.
abstract: Pres Obama authorizes admittance of at least 10,000 Syrian refugees in 2016.

byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS, DAVID E. SANGER and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN
byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: Aid groups called the action a token one given the size of the U.S. economy and population, and some Republicans said President Obama was allowing in potential terrorists.

headline.main: Obama Increases Number of Syrian Refugees for U.S. Resettlement to 10,000
headline.print_headline: Obama Increases Number of Syrian Refugees for U.S. Resettlement to 10,000

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
